A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It does not \"honor\" the legacy\, it mocks and destroys it. Yoda shows up\, tells Luke to train Rey\, he agrees\, then commits suicide? If he went there to die why not \"release himself to the force\" years ago? Rey's parents are junk traders? Snook was a supreme leader? Where are the other 6 jedi? It's like it was written by a 10 year old
